name: Totally Unexpected Safety Drill
description:
Save the Dummies from the flames with the help of the Pawns.

In this game created for the Houdini Game Jam 2020 Don't Panic! you have to place the Pawns that will help you lead the little characters at the exit of the burning building.

CONTROLS:

- W A S D : to MOVE camera

- Q E : to ROTATE camera

- SPACE or Right Click: to SLOW time

- SHIFT: to SPEED time

- Left Click and Menu: to PLACE pawns

For the develop we use Houdini, Houdini Engine and Unity Engine as main tools for the game.

We developed a Houdini Tool to create automatic environment buildings, generating the floor, rooms, rooms separation, doors and floor holes only using unity cubes.  The doors are automatically calculated based on the distance between the internal walls.

The flames were modeled in Houdini, we focused on the mesh, and they have special vertex color that is used for the Shader and Material in Unity. ( The smoke was also modeled in Houdini).


We wanted to create a game color blindness friendly, so we try to use colors that are not confusing.



We are Fuimos Nosotros, a Mexican couple of developers (David Ville as Technical Artist and Programer, and Katia Orozco as Artist).

Despite having had a very heavy week of work, we gave ourselves the chance to participate in the jam in our spare time each day. Finally, we dedicate the whole day to it on Thursday before delivery.

It has been a huge effort but we have achieved something that we are happy to show and enjoy developing.

Thanks for playing our game!

Follow us in Twitter as @pirocanto and @Fuimos_Nosotros

Other tools used in the development were:

  • Autodeks Maya
  • Amplify Shader
  • Chronos
  • Procedural UI Image
  • DoozyUI
  • Dynamic Bone
  • DOTween
  • Clean Flat Icon
  • UI Gradient
  • UMotion
  • Mixamo
